snippet: In between the panel sessions and festival events at South by Southwest Interactive, Times staff members connected with Matt Buchanan of BuzzFeed and Andrea Vaccari, of the mobile app maker Glancee to catch up on the goings-on. Plus a sampling of...
abstract: In between the panel sessions and festival events at South by Southwest Interactive, Times staff members connected with Matt Buchanan of BuzzFeed and Andrea Vaccari, of the mobile app maker Glancee to catch up on the goings-on. Plus a sampling of Sunday's updates on our special Tumblr blog.

headline.main: Updates From SXSW Interactive, With a Video Chat
